resources.string: (enter activity level, needed to calculate metabolism)
Chronological age is needed to calculate metabolism because it allows for assumptions to be made about the individual\'s muscle mass, bone mass, and endocrine system.
Biological gender is needed to calculate metabolism because it allows for assumptions to be made about the individual\'s muscle mass, bone mass, and endocrine system.
An individual\'s metabolism is largely dependent on their body\'s surface area, which requires height to calculate.
An individual\'s metabolism is largely dependent on their body\'s surface area, which requires weight to calculate.
An individual\'s metabolism depends on their physical activity because calories are used to fuel physical activity.
